segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye with its everyday chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water spilling out freely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing a plate, standing in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy mess, water everywhere like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, just waiting to get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, reaching into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling, and he's not even careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like thieves, how naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl helping him, hand out for her piece of the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how the water might make the floor slippery and unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are dripping, ruining the wood probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine, making the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a disregard for cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR
